channel.title: Npc help. Please read SIMPLE FIX PROBLY
channel.description: Ok, so i figured out how to make npc's talk But. Im having a problem! They will only talk one line at a time and when you click "Click here to continue" it exits and you have to re-talk to them to get the next line :( can anybody possibly help me?

item.title: Npc help. Please read SIMPLE FIX PROBLY
item.dc:creator: @nick_alfrado nick alfrado
item.description:
@nick_alfrado wrote:

I Recommend if you cant find a TuT, to use a mezzyscape Source [508] and search were their files are and copy Pasta it. MABY you’ll learn Alot from looking thro their files and recreating it on yours.

Read full topic
item.source: Npc help. Please read SIMPLE FIX PROBLY
